author: iSazonov
body: We call ExecuteCommand function over 80 times so it makes sense to optimize it for slow CI VMs.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body:
Pester report for Parser.Tests.ps1 on my notebook:
* before - 12.20s
* after    -  10.50s

Win is 1.7s

title: Make small optimization in parser tests
